			[1536] heading 'How to approach a system design interview question'
			[1538] blockquote ''
				[1539] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'How to tackle a system design interview question.'
			[1540] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'The system design interview is an'
				[1541] strong ''
					StaticText 'open-ended conversation'
				StaticText '. You are expected to lead it.'
			[1542] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'You can use the following steps to guide the discussion. To help solidify this process, work through the'
				[1543] link 'System design interview questions with solutions', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/donnemartin/system-design-primer#system-design-interview-questions-with-solutions'
				StaticText 'section using the following steps.'
			[1544] heading 'Step 1: Outline use cases, constraints, and assumptions'
			[1546] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Gather requirements and scope the problem. Ask questions to clarify use cases and constraints. Discuss assumptions.'
			[1547] list ''
				[1548] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'Who is going to use it?'
				[1549] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'How are they going to use it?'
				[1550] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'How many users are there?'
				[1551] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'What does the system do?'
				[1552] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'What are the inputs and outputs of the system?'
				[1553] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'How much data do we expect to handle?'
				[1554] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'How many requests per second do we expect?'
				[1555] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'What is the expected read to write ratio?'
			[1556] heading 'Step 2: Create a high level design'
			[1558] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Outline a high level design with all important components.'
			[1559] list ''
				[1560] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'Sketch the main components and connections'
				[1561] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'Justify your ideas'

			[1564] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Dive into details for each core component. For example, if you were asked to'
				[1565] link 'design a url shortening service', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/donnemartin/system-design-primer/-/blob/master/solutions/system_design/pastebin/README.md'
				StaticText ', discuss:'
			[1566] list ''
				[1567] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'Generating and storing a hash of the full url'

			[1581] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Identify and address bottlenecks, given the constraints. For example, do you need the following to address scalability issues?'
